footer.title: SkyLine Ceilings
footer.description: Premium Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings

home.aboutTitle: What are Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings?
home.aboutLead: Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings are modern Hi-Tech stretch ceilings made from engineered textile with acrylic impregnation, designed for architectural and designer interiors. This is not plastic or film.
home.aboutText: This is a breathable fabric that:
home.aboutFeature3: is not afraid of cold and heat
home.aboutFeature4: looks like a perfectly painted ceiling
home.ecologyText: Descor and HEYtex fabrics are produced according to European environmental safety standards and are suitable for premises with increased requirements:
home.ecologyFeature1: do not contain PVC, phthalates and toxic plasticizers
home.ecologyFeature4: are not a medium for fungus and mold
home.ecologyFeature5: hypoallergenic — safe for children and people with allergies
home.ecologyWhereTitle: That is why such ceilings are used in:
home.techTitle: HEYtex & Descor technology — the ceiling of the future
home.appearanceText: After installation, the ceiling looks like:
home.appearance2: expensive drywall without seams and cracks
home.comparisonNote: Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings can be repainted 5–7 times with regular interior paint, changing the interior style without dismantling the ceiling.
home.typesShadowDesc: Modern ceiling system with neat gap between wall and ceiling
home.typesFloatingDesc: Soft light line around the perimeter creates a floating effect
home.typesMultiLevelDesc: Multiple levels create volume, depth and dynamics of space

about.title: About us
about.welcome: Welcome to SkyLine Ceilings — a company that transforms ordinary ceilings into premium architectural elements. We create fabric ceilings and walls that combine style, functionality and technology, providing comfort and aesthetics in every project.
about.missionText: We strive to make interiors modern, safe and unique:
about.mission1: Each ceiling and wall is designed taking into account the individual characteristics of the room.
about.mission2: We use only eco-friendly and hypoallergenic materials safe for children and adults.
about.mission3: We create solutions that work for comfort, acoustics, light and visual space.
about.why1a: More than 3 years on the European market
about.why1b: More than 1500 meters of ceiling installed
about.why1c: Up to 15 years warranty on materials and installation
about.why2a: Descor and HEYtex stretch fabrics with acrylic impregnation
about.why2b: Durable, resistant to moisture and wear
about.why2c: Smooth matte surface without folds and glare
about.why3a: Quiet fabric walls, hidden hatches, built-in ventilation, tracks and hidden curtains
about.why3b: Integration of light lines, spotlights and chandeliers
about.why4b: Acoustic and functional solutions for any task
about.why4c: Mounts for TVs, shelves, mirrors and other elements
about.why5b: Support at all stages: from design to installation and maintenance
about.why5c: Individual consultations and solution selection for interior style
about.philosophyText: We believe that ceiling and walls are not just construction, but an element that sets the atmosphere of space. With us, your interiors become:
about.philosophyEnd: We combine beauty, comfort and engineering solutions in one product, making each project unique and durable.
about.partnersText: We cooperate with leading European companies:
about.partnersEnd: These partners ensure quality, innovation and reliability of all materials and systems we use.
about.contactText: Our team is ready to offer an individual solution for any project: apartment, office, studio, commercial space or design showroom.
about.contactEnd: With SkyLine Ceilings, your ceiling and walls are architecture, technology and style in every detail.

prices.title: Prices for Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings
prices.lead: We offer a transparent pricing system. The cost depends on the area of the room, the number of corners and lighting elements.
prices.note1: All prices include material and standard installation.
prices.note2: Complex structures, non-standard shapes and profiles are calculated individually.
prices.note3: Fixture prices are without lamps and LED modules.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.lead: Photos and videos of our completed works

shadowCeilings.title: Shadow ceilings
shadowCeilings.lead: Shadow ceiling is a modern ceiling system where a neat gap — shadow line — is created between the wall and ceiling.
shadowCeilings.text1: This visually separates the ceiling from the walls and makes it look like an independent architectural plane.
shadowCeilings.text2: This technique is used in modern architecture and interior design where important are:
shadowCeilings.text3: The shadow line is formed using a special aluminum profile installed around the perimeter of the room. It is hidden from view and creates an even, perfectly straight gap between ceiling and wall.
shadowCeilings.text4: As a result, the ceiling does not touch the walls visually, creating a 'floating' effect and emphasizing the shape of the room.
shadowCeilings.text5: Shadow ceilings are especially effective when combined with Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings, as their matte surface emphasizes shadow depth and makes lines as clear as possible.
shadowCeilings.whereTitle: This type of ceiling is used in:
shadowCeilings.end: Shadow ceiling is an architectural element that makes interiors cleaner, more modern and visually expensive.

floatingCeilings.title: Floating ceilings
floatingCeilings.lead: Floating ceiling is a modern ceiling system where a soft light line is created around the perimeter of the room, making the ceiling appear suspended in the air.
floatingCeilings.text1: Light comes from a hidden profile between ceiling and wall and forms uniform glow without visible light sources.
floatingCeilings.text2: This creates an effect of lightness, depth and visual space increase.
floatingCeilings.importantTitle: Floating ceilings are used in modern interiors where important are:
floatingCeilings.text3: The technology is based on a special aluminum profile with LED backlight installed around the perimeter. Light reflects from walls and softly illuminates the ceiling, forming a 'floating' effect.
floatingCeilings.text4: Such system perfectly combines with Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings, as their matte surface evenly diffuses light and eliminates glare.
floatingCeilings.end: This is not just a ceiling — it's a light architectural element that forms the mood of the entire space.

multiLevelCeilings.title: Multi-level ceiling
multiLevelCeilings.lead: Multi-level ceiling is a ceiling system consisting of several levels or tiers located at different heights.
multiLevelCeilings.text1: Each level creates volume, depth and dynamics of space, turning an ordinary ceiling into a designer interior element.
multiLevelCeilings.allows3: to integrate lighting solutions, hidden backlight or decorative elements
multiLevelCeilings.text2: Multi-level structure is formed using special profiles and stretch fabric (e.g., Descor or HEYtex), allowing to create:
multiLevelCeilings.effectiveTitle: Multi-level ceiling is especially effective in:
multiLevelCeilings.end: It combines aesthetics and functionality, allowing to implement bold design ideas and visually expand space.

printedCeilings.title: Ceilings with fabric printing
printedCeilings.lead: Ceilings with printing on fabric are designer stretch ceilings with high-quality images applied using digital printing.
printedCeilings.text1: The technology allows to turn the ceiling into a unique visual interior element — from light textures to artistic compositions and sky with clouds.
printedCeilings.text2: Printing is done on Descor and HEYtex fabrics, which have a special surface for even paint absorption.
printedCeilings.text3: The image becomes part of the fabric and does not crack, fade or peel over time.
printedCeilings.canBe3: with imitation of concrete, fabric, sky, marble
printedCeilings.looksNote: Matte fabric surface eliminates glare and makes the image deep and natural.
printedCeilings.techText: Eco-friendly latex or UV printing is used, which:
printedCeilings.techNote: Printing does not damage fabric structure and preserves its breathability.
printedCeilings.whereEnd: This is an ideal solution when the ceiling should become part of the design, not just background.

lightingSolutions.heroSubtitle: for using any lighting fixtures in fabric ceilings
lightingSolutions.lead: Lighting is one of the key interior elements. Light shapes the feeling of space, affects mood, comfort and how colors, forms and materials are perceived.
lightingSolutions.text1: Even the most expensive interior without properly built light looks flat. Conversely — competent lighting can make space visually higher, wider and more expensive.
lightingSolutions.text2: Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings allow building architectural lighting where light sources become part of the ceiling, not separate fixtures. Light integrates into the structure and works as a unified system.
lightingSolutions.text3: Matte fabric structure plays an important role: it softly diffuses light, eliminates glare and harsh shadows, making lighting:
lightingSolutions.text4: Such light does not tire, does not 'cut' space and creates a feeling of comfort and premium.
lightingSolutions.allows2: to highlight zones in the room
lightingSolutions.allows4: to create different scenarios — from bright working to soft evening
lightingSolutions.text5: Lighting systems in fabric ceilings are designed as a whole: light lines, tracks, backlights and fixtures work together, forming a holistic light image of the interior.
lightingSolutions.linearDesc: Light lines built into the ceiling create clear geometry and modern style.
lightingSolutions.trackDesc: Magnetic and classic track systems are integrated into the ceiling, allowing to change fixture placement.
lightingSolutions.spotlightsDesc: Spotlights and spots integrate into the fabric, remaining almost invisible.
lightingSolutions.chandeliersDesc: Fabric ceilings allow installing chandeliers, pendant and designer fixtures without restrictions.

linearLighting.title: Linear lighting in fabric ceilings
linearLighting.lead: Linear lighting is one of the most modern and architectural ways to backlight a ceiling. In systems with Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings, light lines become part of the structure and look like built-in light elements, not surface-mounted fixtures.
linearLighting.text1: An aluminum profile attached to the base ceiling is used for installation. An LED module with diffuser is placed inside the profile, then the fabric is stretched flush with the profile. As a result, the light line is perfectly even, without frames, gaps and visible mounts.
linearLighting.allowsTitle: Such lines can be used as main light source or architectural backlight. They allow creating:
linearLighting.text2: Matte Descor and HEYtex fabric evenly diffuses light, so lines look soft and deep, without dots and harsh glare.
linearLighting.text3: Linear lighting is especially in demand in modern apartments, offices, showrooms and commercial interiors where clean geometry and minimalist style are important.

trackLighting.title: Track systems in fabric ceilings
trackLighting.lead: Track lighting is a flexible system that allows directing light where it's needed. In Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings, tracks integrate into the ceiling structure and look like part of architecture, not surface-mounted equipment.
trackLighting.text1: Special mounts to which track profile is attached are installed before stretching fabric. After this, fabric is stretched flush with the system, and track becomes visually built into the ceiling.
trackLighting.canMountTitle: In such ceilings can be mounted:
trackLighting.text2: Fixtures can be freely moved, added or removed, light direction changed and new light scenarios created without ceiling rework.
trackLighting.text3: This solution is ideal for living rooms, kitchens, offices, stores and galleries where flexibility and ability to change interior accents are required.

spotlights.title: Spotlights in fabric ceilings
spotlights.lead: Spotlights are a universal way to create functional and neat lighting. In Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings they are installed using thermal rings and mounting platforms fixed to the base ceiling before fabric stretching.
spotlights.system3: allows fixture replacement if needed without ceiling dismantling
spotlights.text1: Thanks to matte fabric surface, light becomes soft and comfortable, and fixtures themselves look neat and do not violate ceiling cleanliness.

chandeliers.title: Chandeliers and pendant fixtures in fabric ceilings
chandeliers.lead: Fabric ceilings allow installing chandeliers and pendant fixtures of any design and weight. All mounts are made to the base ceiling through special mounting platforms, and fabric neatly bypasses the mount point.
chandeliers.means3: massive and designer fixtures can be used
chandeliers.text1: All wiring, mounts and fixation elements are hidden behind the ceiling, so only the fixture itself is visible in the interior — clean and aesthetic.
chandeliers.text2: Chandeliers and pendants are often used as central design elements, and built-in lighting complements them and creates multi-level light scenarios.

innovations.heroTitle: We keep up with the latest innovations in fabric ceilings
innovations.heroSubtitle: and always implement all innovations in our projects
innovations.title: Latest fabric ceiling market innovations
innovations.lead: Modern fabric ceilings are not just a flat surface overhead. Today these are innovative architectural systems that combine design, comfort and functionality.
innovations.text1: Technologies appear on the market that make ceilings and walls smarter, quieter and more flexible:
innovations.quietWallsDesc: They create coziness and absorb sound, turning the room into a quiet and comfortable zone.
innovations.hiddenHatchesDesc: Invisibly hiding access to utilities and allowing to maintain perfect ceiling surface.
innovations.ventilationDesc: Built directly into profiles and tracks, without bulky boxes and visible grilles.
innovations.hiddenCurtainsDesc: Which completely hide in the ceiling, providing minimalist and modern interior.
innovations.text2: These innovations make ceilings not only beautiful but also smart and functional. They allow managing light, air, sound and even decor — all hidden from view.
innovations.text3: With Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings you create space that looks expensive, works for comfort and emphasizes unique interior style.

quietWalls.title: Quiet fabric walls
quietWalls.lead: Quiet fabric walls are a modern solution for interiors where comfort, acoustics and style are important. They turn ordinary walls into functional, designer and acoustically comfortable surfaces, creating a feeling of silence and coziness.
quietWalls.text1: Systems made from Descor and HEYtex fabrics make walls not only beautiful but also technically perfect:
quietWalls.techDesc: Quiet fabric walls consist of several key elements:
quietWalls.frame1: Aluminum profiles are attached to walls and form a strong frame for fabric.
quietWalls.frame2: Profiles allow stretching fabric without folds and maintaining its shape for decades.
quietWalls.frame3: Mounts for any tasks can be integrated into the frame: TV, mirrors, shelves and other interior elements.
quietWalls.frame4: Possibility of installing hidden niches, light lines or tracks.
quietWalls.acoustic1: Special 2 cm thick acoustic fabric is laid under the fabric, significantly increasing sound absorption.
quietWalls.acoustic2: The fabric reduces noise, making the room quieter and more comfortable for work and rest.
quietWalls.tissue1: High-quality Descor and HEYtex fabrics with acrylic impregnation are used.
quietWalls.tissue2: Stretched using damping system that provides even and safe stretching without folds.
quietWalls.tissue3: Material additionally absorbs sound waves, improving room acoustics.
quietWalls.sound1: Combination of acoustic fabric, tissue and frame reduces noise level by 40–50%.
quietWalls.sound2: System is suitable for apartments, offices, meeting rooms and children's rooms.
quietWalls.mount1: Fabric is stretched on profiles with damping system, ensuring safe and even stretching.
quietWalls.mount2: Easy dismantling allows maintaining hidden utilities or changing fabric without wall destruction.
quietWalls.mount3: Not afraid of moisture and easily cleaned with damp soft cloth.
quietWalls.benefit3: Smooth matte surface without joints and folds
quietWalls.benefit4: Possibility of integrating mounts for TV, mirrors, shelves and other elements
quietWalls.benefit5: Possibility of installing light lines, tracks and hidden systems
quietWalls.text2: Quiet fabric walls turn interiors into space comfortable for work, rest and life, combining style, acoustics and functionality. Descor and HEYtex systems allow creating premium solutions where each wall works for comfort and room design.
quietWalls.price: Cost per m² of quiet fabric walls starts from 45 euros, depending on many factors such as wall condition, number of corners, outlet switches etc.

hiddenHatches.title: Hidden hatches in fabric ceilings
hiddenHatches.lead: Modern Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings allow integrating invisible hatches and panels that completely merge with the fabric. This solution is ideal for spaces where minimalism, clean lines and functionality are important, and utility access remains hidden.
hiddenHatches.text1: Hidden hatches turn the ceiling into an architectural element that works for comfort and design without violating visual interior integrity.
hiddenHatches.techDesc: Hidden hatches consist of several elements:
hiddenHatches.frame1: Aluminum profiles form a strong hatch frame that integrates into the stretch ceiling.
hiddenHatches.frame2: Profiles allow fixing fabric evenly, ensuring perfect geometry and absence of folds.
hiddenHatches.frame3: Damping system stretches fabric effortlessly, preserving fabric integrity and construction durability.
hiddenHatches.face1: Same fabric as on the ceiling is used so the hatch is invisible after installation.
hiddenHatches.face2: Descor and HEYtex materials are hypoallergenic, eco-friendly and durable.
hiddenHatches.access1: Hatch allows unnoticeable access to wiring, ventilation, fixtures and other hidden elements.
hiddenHatches.access2: Removed easily and safely without fabric or ceiling construction damage.
hiddenHatches.mount1: Installation is performed together with fabric stretching.
hiddenHatches.mount2: Frame can be prepared for any hatch sizes and shapes, including square, rectangular or custom designer options.
hiddenHatches.mount3: Hatch maintenance does not require full ceiling dismantling — just open the hatch and perform work.
hiddenHatches.benefit2: Easy utility access without ceiling dismantling
hiddenHatches.benefit3: Compatibility with Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings
hiddenHatches.benefit4: Possibility of individual hatch size and shape
hiddenHatches.benefit5: Use of damping system for safe and even fabric stretching
hiddenHatches.benefit6: Suitable for residential, office and commercial premises
hiddenHatches.text2: Hidden hatches make fabric ceiling maximally functional and minimalist, allowing to combine aesthetics and practicality. Descor and HEYtex systems turn the ceiling into a full architectural element that hides all utilities while remaining a perfect visual surface.
hiddenHatches.price: Cost of hidden hatch manufacturing starts from 100 euros and is calculated individually

ventilation.title: Built-in ventilation and air conditioning systems in fabric ceilings
ventilation.lead: Modern Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings allow integrating ventilation and air conditioning directly into profiles and track systems. This solution is ideal for interiors where minimalism, clean lines and functionality are important, as well as even air distribution without bulky boxes and grilles.
ventilation.text1: Built-in systems make the ceiling not only a decorative element but also part of engineering infrastructure, preserving aesthetic appearance and room comfort.
ventilation.techText: Ventilation and air conditioning systems integrate into aluminum profiles and track channels installed on the base ceiling before fabric stretching.
ventilation.profiles1: Profiles and track systems are made with possibility of embedding air ducts and ventilation grilles.
ventilation.profiles2: Hidden channels allow directing air flow exactly to needed zones, creating comfortable circulation without visible elements.
ventilation.functions1: Connection to central air conditioning or ventilation system.
ventilation.functions2: Hidden grilles and ventilation channels are fully integrated without violating minimalist design.
ventilation.mount1: All components are installed before fabric stretching, ensuring precise air duct placement.
ventilation.mount2: Fabric ceiling is easily removed or provides access to ventilation elements without construction damage.
ventilation.benefitsTitle: Benefits of built-in ventilation and air conditioning
ventilation.benefit1: Aesthetics: no visible boxes and grilles
ventilation.benefit3: Compatibility with all Descor and HEYtex systems
ventilation.benefit4: Easy maintenance without full fabric dismantling
ventilation.text2: Built-in ventilation and air conditioning systems turn fabric ceiling into a full engineering and architectural element, combining design, comfort and functionality.
ventilation.price: Cost of such structures is calculated individually as they are manufactured individually for each project

hiddenCurtains.title: Hidden curtains in fabric ceilings
hiddenCurtains.lead: Modern Descor and HEYtex fabric ceilings allow completely hiding curtain and drape systems inside profiles. This solution is ideal for interiors where clean lines, minimalism and premium look are important, and curtains themselves remain functional but completely invisible when not used.
hiddenCurtains.text1: Hidden curtains turn the ceiling into an architectural element combining style, technology and comfort of managing light and privacy.
hiddenCurtains.techDesc: Hidden curtain systems consist of several elements:
hiddenCurtains.frame1: Aluminum profiles integrate into fabric ceiling and create invisible niche for cornice or guide.
hiddenCurtains.frame2: Profile ensures strength, precise geometry and maintains ceiling fabric even and without folds.
hiddenCurtains.frame3: Profile can be combined with tracks and mounts for additional interior elements.
hiddenCurtains.tissue1: Descor or HEYtex fabric is stretched using damping system, preserving even ceiling surface.
hiddenCurtains.tissue2: Hidden curtains are completely closed with fabric and become almost invisible from any angle.
hiddenCurtains.curtains1: Both classic cornices and track systems for curtains can be installed in the niche.
hiddenCurtains.curtains2: Curtains can be single-layer, multi-layer or combined, completely retracting into the niche.
hiddenCurtains.curtains3: Guides and mechanisms are hidden, preserving minimalist and clean ceiling appearance.
hiddenCurtains.mount1: System is installed before fabric stretching, and after fabric the niche is completely closed.
hiddenCurtains.mount2: If needed, access to curtain mechanisms is through hidden panels, without removing the entire ceiling.
hiddenCurtains.mount3: Compatible with other built-in systems: light lines, tracks, ventilation.
hiddenCurtains.benefit1: Complete invisibility of cornice and guides
hiddenCurtains.benefit2: Even, clean ceiling surface is preserved
hiddenCurtains.benefit3: Possibility of installing any types of curtains and fabric
hiddenCurtains.benefit5: Compatibility with track and light systems
hiddenCurtains.text2: Hidden curtains turn the ceiling into a universal architectural element that combines aesthetics, functionality and comfort. Descor and HEYtex systems allow creating an interior where every detail works for style and convenience.
hiddenCurtains.price: Cost of curtains is 60 euros per linear meter
